scenarios.title: Internet Service Upgrade
scenarios.description: Handle a customer inquiry about upgrading their internet service. Provide information about available upgrades, answer questions about speeds, and process the upgrade request.

context.role: Customer Service Representative for an internet service provider

special_offers.description: Free upgrade from Standard to High-Speed for loyal customers
special_offers.eligibility: Customers with accounts older than 1 year
special_offers.details: No price increase, effective immediately after processing

special_offers.eligibility: New upgrades from Standard or High-Speed

agent_goals: Identify the customer's interest in upgrading internet
Check account details and available offers
Highlight special offers the customer is eligible for
Provide details about when the upgrade will take effect

evaluation_criteria.greeting_quality: How well the agent greeted the customer and established rapport
evaluation_criteria.problem_solving: How effectively the agent identified and addressed the customer's needs
evaluation_criteria.knowledge: Accuracy and completeness of information provided about services and offers
evaluation_criteria.communication: Clarity, professionalism, and friendliness of communication
evaluation_criteria.efficiency: How quickly and effectively the agent processed the request
evaluation_criteria.overall_satisfaction: Overall quality of the customer service experience

scenarios.title: Account Password Reset
scenarios.description: Assist a customer who has forgotten their password and needs to reset it. Guide them through the password reset process and answer any questions.

context.role: Customer Service Representative for an online service
reset_process: Send reset link to registered email
Customer clicks link and creates new password

agent_goals: Confirm the customer received the link
Ensure the customer can log in
Ask if there's anything else needed

evaluation_criteria.greeting_quality: How well the agent greeted the customer and established rapport
evaluation_criteria.security_adherence: How well the agent followed security protocols for identity verification
evaluation_criteria.guidance_clarity: Clarity and helpfulness of instructions provided
evaluation_criteria.problem_resolution: Effectiveness in resolving the password reset issue
evaluation_criteria.communication: Clarity, professionalism, and friendliness of communication
evaluation_criteria.overall_satisfaction: Overall quality of the customer service experience
